titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Alfred B. Fitt, Special Assistant to the President of Yale University for Community and Alumni Affairs, Records
Fitt (Alfred B), Special Assistant to the President of Yale University for Community and Alumni Affairs, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:43

did.unittitle: Alfred B. Fitt, special assistant to the president of Yale University for community and alumni affairs, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of the administrative files of Alfred B. Fitt documenting his role as special assistant for community and alumni affairs.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 2-B (YRG 2-B), Records of Yale presidential assistants.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is partially restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Alfred B. Fitt, Special Assistant to the President of Yale University for Community and Alumni Relations, Records (RU 446). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged alphabetically by subject.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of the administrative files of Alfred B. Fitt documenting his role as special assistant for community and alumni affairs.

did.unittitle: Records of Alfred B. Fitt as special assistant to the president concerning community and alumni affairs

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research. Restricted folders are identified with their restriction review date.
